mapper.insert: insert into SCORE (STUDENT_ID, COURSE_ID, SCORE, TEACHER_ID) values (#{studentId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
